shortdesc.i: The FilePickerOptions object contains options that are passed into {@link blackberry.invoke.card.invokeFilePicker}(). {Sample - Set Wallpaper using File Picker } https://github.com/blackberry/BB10-WebWorks-Samples/tree/master/SetWallpaper Sample that demonstrates how to use the BlackBerry Invoke FilePicker API [BlackBerry on GitHub].
